replies.body:
I still say you guys should make a poro-based mini game, kind of like the Chao gardens in Sonic Adventure 2 (Friend had that game, and the Chao garden was pretty much the only reason I played).

EDIT: And not like Legend of the Poro King (Which was awesome, by the way) where it had a Poro Theme; I mean a separate game entirely, where you can raise and train poros or something like that.
Raise a poro and compete them with other people's poros! :O
Porómon
Reading that inspired me to do this  a shiny Poroark
lol great name

Thats a great idea! But i dont know how it would work out... maybe riot can give us poros to dress up and we can buy dresses/ suits for them to put on and keep us company! What do you think? They would show up in the main menu and they could respond to touches of the mouse and stuff :D
Sort of like the paperclip on the old Microsoft word. lol
what... is this game turning into a MMORPG?
Club Poro
Porogotchi.
if they did something like that, they could actually be called Riot ***GAMES***
Still waiting for a udyr poro.
BUT URF PORO!!!!
And a Gnar poro.
and Kha'zix
and Nocturne
and Jayce
And Fiora
And Viktor and Orianna

RITO!!!! plz make a game like ^ for MOBILE this includes ANDROID and APPLE.
do 1 of 2 ideas.
make a game for moblie that is league of legends ...with poros dressed up as the champs.
or 
make a game where you can get a poro raise them, dress them in filly coustomizable clothes, choose their fur color, eyes, tongue , personality, make their pen/house/home, then lv them up, and battle them against fellow league players, and not the turn based battle , i mean either lLEAGUE OF LEGENDS style fights or somthing more like battle bears gold or dragon ball Z style fights.....it would be so cool and the league community would like it 

 {{summoner:31}} says please and so does{{summoner:30}}

> [{quoted}](name=Siachi,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=vtXZjxxX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-20T18:14:26.292+0000)
>
> I still say you guys should make a poro-based mini game, kind of like the Chao gardens in Sonic Aventure 2 (Friend had that game, and the Chao garden was pretty much the only reason I played).
> 
> EDIT: And not like Legend of the Poro King (Which was awesome, by the way) where it had a Poro Theme; I mean a separate game entirely, where you can raise and train poros or something like that.

You sir, need a medal. That is an epic idea. Maybe start with one poro for one minigame, and have five minigames. As you play them, the poros get better, then throw them into a battle arena where they fight to the death! Except, they don't die. That'd ruin the point of taking days to train them. :/ (btw, I had a max'd out Chao. It was hilarious watching him wind up a punch to annihilate everyone.)

I love the chao garden idea. And then each champion kill has a chance of dropping a doll depending on the champ that you can use to train the poros in place of animals. Lol I dunno, think I may be drunk...
I agree with this guy we should get a poro game mode like where champions are poros on the howling abyss and where the non champ poros are champions but small until fed.
I would.... Love this..... So much
Someone start a new thread about this -- will upvote xDD
never search poro{{champion:24}}  on google images

I have filed a report with Google, but I can't promise anything.  I would recommend not searching for any poro-ized champions on Google image search without safe search if you're uncomfortable with NSFW material. It's a pretty unpleasant surprise if it's not what you're looking for :(
I didn't believe you. Now i have to burn my eyes out. {{item:3187}}

> [{quoted}](name=swaglikenasif2,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=vtXZjxxX,comment-id=0048,timestamp=2015-03-20T20:27:07.947+0000)
>
> never search poro{{champion:24}}  on google images

.....
Do NOT search up Poro Jax on google images... Just trust me.

Poro is the Finnish word for Reindeer.
Rein means to keep under control; restrain.
This is a trap.
RITO is gonna nerf these champions.
Half Life 3 confirmed.
